sentences.en: Beyond this zone only few intergalactic stars are seen.
sentences.cn: 超过这个距离后,仅能发现零星的星系间恒星.

sentences.en: In an intergalactic dimension, aliens are on the offense moving in to annihilate mankind.
sentences.cn: 在星球中, 外国人在移动中进攻,以消灭人类.

sentences.en: Intergalactic travel remains just a nice idea.
sentences.cn: 银河间的旅行仍然只是个美好的愿望。

sentences.en: The double bass and straight heavy beat make this a truly intergalactic track.
sentences.cn: 低音提琴和直的沉重的节拍使这为真地存在于星系际的踪迹.

sentences.en: The milky way travels through intergalactic space.

trans.tran_en: between the large groups of stars in space
